p: The present study is a review of the literature on the effects of nutrition on the condition of the skin, as well as an attempt to establish whether a healthy diet supplemented with vitamins and minerals has photoprotective and anti-ageing effects. The aim of the study was to present the effects of bioactives on skin parameters such as a wrinkled appearance, elasticity, firmness, senile dryness, hydration, and color, as well as their role in the skin ageing process.
